game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: You have heard rumors about a lost treasure hidden deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find this treasure and bring it back.

task.description: Start by exploring the dense jungle, searching for any clues or landmarks that may lead you to the treasure.
Once you find a mysterious map, decipher the symbols and riddles to figure out the exact location of the treasure.
There will be booby traps set to protect the treasure. Use your wit and skills to bypass them without triggering any alarms.
